subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ general manager, Jerry Reese spoke about Plaxico Burress’s possible future with the team, provided he was not in jail and he had a 180-degree attitude adjustment.
snippet: The Giants’ general manager, Jerry Reese spoke about Plaxico Burress’s possible future with the team, provided he was not in jail and he had a 180-degree attitude adjustment.
